problem_text: Given right triangle X Y Z with hypotenuse X Y, Y P is equal to Y Z. If m \angle P Y Z = 26, find m \angle X Z P.
compact_text: Given right triangle XYZ with hypotenuse XY, YP is equal to YZ. If m \angle PYZ = 26, find m \angle XZP.
annotat_text: Given right triangle $XYZ$ with hypotenuse $\overline{XY}$, $YP$ is equal to $YZ$. If $m ∠PYZ = 26$, find $m ∠XZP$.
